WorkflowInfo.Name: Automate Linux command
WorkflowInfo.Description: Execute Linux commnd on list of servers
WorkflowInfo.XML: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:ReadXLS;Assembly=ReadXLS, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:StartSSHSession;Assembly=StartSSHSession, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:SendSSHCommand;Assembly=SendSSHCommand, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:TerminateSSHSession;Assembly=TerminateSSHSession, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:ReadXLS IsValid="True" x:Name="readXLS1" HostName="localhost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Read Excel" Path="c:\Servers.xls" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Read excel file" HostId="1" TypeName="ReadXLS" UserName="" /><ns1:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="readXLS1" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /><WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"><SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"><ns2:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%getRowsCount1%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /><ns3:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="ServerName" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="readXLS1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /><ns4:StartSSHSession Password="6C5561636A35564A747A476757685932386A516F2B773D3D" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" HostName="%ServerName%" DisplayName="Start SSH Session" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" Port="22" TypeName="StartSSHSession" OSType="0" TimeInSeconds="0" MaxSessionTime="00:10:00" x:Name="startSSHSession1" Timeout="00:01:00" UserName="root" Description="Starts SSH Session." StartSession="SSH" /><ns5:SendSSHCommand Comm="cp /etc/hosts /etc/hosts_backup" x:Name="sendSSHCommand1" HostName="{x:Null}" Prompt="" SessionName="startSSHSession1" Timeout="00:01:00" IsValid="True" DisplayName="Send SSH Command" OSType="0" TimeInSeconds="0" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Send SSH command." HostId="0" TypeName="SendSSHCommand" /><ns6:TerminateSSHSession SessionName="startSSHSession1" x:Name="terminateSSHSession1" TimeInSeconds="0" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Terminate SSH Session" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Terminate SSH session." HostId="0" TypeName="TerminateSSHSession" /></SequenceActivity></WhileActivity></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
